article: We lived in a house with a yard surrounded by a rock wall. Last summer, I found a little _ plant in the yard. We decided to let it continue growing until we could figure out what it was.  The mysterious plant appeared to be a sunflower, so I decided to take care of it. One day, as I pulled rocks from the area to get to the weeds, I noticed something _ . The sunflowers had not _ where I saw the stalk begin. It _ had begun under a big rock and grown under and around it to reach the _ . That's when I _ that if a tiny little sunflower didn't let a big rock stand in its _ of developing, we too have the capability of doing the same thing. Once our environment begins to see that we believe in ourselves like that little sunflower, we can _ the same nutrient as well. We need to believe in ourselves knowing we have the capabilities in _ our desires. Like the sunflower, it knew it had the capability to overcome its obstacle because it _ in the universal truth and had _ that it would succeed. Stand tall like the sunflower and be _ of who and what you are and the _ will begin to support you. You will find a way to go under or _ your big obstacle in order to reach your desires.
